          <title>
            <string language="es">Cada vez que tiras simula el lanzamiento de 10 monedas. Útil para experimentar la ley de Laplace</string>
            <string language="en">Every attempt simulates the tossing of 10 coins (useful to experiment with Laplace's law)</string>
